pageContext.claim: “The Democrats are turning down services and security for citizens in favor of services and security for non-citizens. Not good!”
pageContext.analysis: This is an exaggeration. Democrats came to Trump with a bipartisan plan that had been crafted in the Senate to fix DACA, or Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals, which would have averted a shutdown. Trump has previously said that he supports DACA - not a far-left proposal. Schumer reportedly also offered funding for the border wall in an effort to reopen the government, which Trump refused.
